abstract: Thai court sentences two migrant workers from Myanmar to death after finding them guilty of murdering two British tourists in 2014; investigation and trial were controversial.
lead_paragraph: The verdict follows an investigation and trial that were mired in controversy, including allegations of police incompetence, mishandling of evidence and torture of the suspects.

headline.main: Thailand: 2 Sentenced to Death for Murders of British Tourists
headline.print_headline: Asia; Thailand: 2 Sentenced to Death for Murders of British Tourists

snippet: The verdict follows an investigation and trial that were mired in controversy, including allegations of police incompetence, mishandling of evidence and torture of the suspects.
